trans-unit.source: Unable to check files for the installed version of PrestaShop.
trans-unit.target: Невозможно проверить файлы установленной версии PrestaShop.

trans-unit.source: %modificationscount% file modifications have been detected, including %coremodifications% from core and native modules:
trans-unit.target: Обнаружено измененных файлов: %modificationscount%, включая %coremodifications% из ядра и нативных модулей:

trans-unit.source: %modifiedfiles% files will be modified, %deletedfiles% files will be deleted (if they are found).
File %s does not exist. Unable to select that channel.
trans-unit.target: файл %s не существует. Невозможно выбрать данный канал.

trans-unit.source: Unable to retrieve version from zip: %s.
trans-unit.target: Unable to retrieve version from zip: %s.

trans-unit.source: Prestashop version detected in the xml (%s) does not match the zip version (%s).
trans-unit.target: Prestashop version detected in the xml (%s) does not match the zip version (%s).

trans-unit.source: Version number is missing. Unable to select that channel.
trans-unit.target: Отсутствует номер версии. Не могу выбрать этот канал.

trans-unit.source: This page will now be reloaded and the module will check if a new version is available.
trans-unit.target: Эта страница будет перезагружена и модуль проверит наличие доступных обновлений.

trans-unit.source: Opening backup database file %filename% in %extension% mode
trans-unit.target: Открываем резервную копию БД %filename% в режиме %extension%

trans-unit.source: Database restoration file %filename% done. %filescount% file(s) left...
trans-unit.target: Файл восстановления базы данных %filename% готов. Осталось файлов: %filescount%...

trans-unit.source: %s file(s) will be removed before restoring the backup files.
trans-unit.target: Перед восстановлением из резервной копии будет удалено файлов: %s.

trans-unit.source: Unable to extract file %filename% into directory %directoryname%.
trans-unit.target: Не удалось извлечь файл %filename% в директорию %directoryname%.
Файлы восстановлены. Идёт восстановление базы данных...

trans-unit.source: [ERROR] File %s is missing: unable to restore files. Operation aborted.
trans-unit.target: [ERROR] Отсутствует файл %s: восстановление невозможно. Действие отменено.

trans-unit.source: [ERROR] No backup database files found: it would be impossible to restore the database. Operation aborted.
trans-unit.target: [ERROR] Восстановление базы данных невозможно: не найдены файлы резервных копий. Действие отменено.

trans-unit.source: Restoration process done. Congratulations! You can now reactivate your shop.
trans-unit.target: Процесс восстановления завершен. Поздравляем! Теперь вы можете активировать ваш магазин.

trans-unit.source: Database backup skipped. Now upgrading files...
trans-unit.target: Создание резервной копии базы данных пропущено. Начинается обновление файлов...
Запись в директорию резервных копий запрещена (%path%).

trans-unit.source: Backup file %s already exists. Operation aborted.
trans-unit.target: Файл резервной копии %s уже существует. Действие отменено.

trans-unit.source: Unable to create backup database file %s.
trans-unit.target: Невозможно создать файл резервной копии базы данных %s.
Ошибка при создании резервной копии базы данных.

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while backing up. Unable to obtain the schema of %s
trans-unit.target: При создании резервной копии возникла ошибка. Невозможно получить схему %s
Резервное копирование базы данных. Осталось таблиц: %s...

trans-unit.source: No valid tables were found to back up. Backup of file %s canceled.
trans-unit.target: Подходящих для резервирования таблиц не обнаружено. Резервное копирование файла %s отменено.

trans-unit.source: Error during database backup for file %s.
trans-unit.target: Ошибка при резервировании базы данных в файл %s.

trans-unit.source: Database backup done in filename %s. Now upgrading files...
trans-unit.target: Резервная копия базы данных сохранена в файл %s. Идет обновление файлов...

trans-unit.source: [ERROR] backupFiles filename has not been set
trans-unit.target: [ERROR] Имя файла резервной копии не задано

trans-unit.source: Backup files in progress. %d files left
All files have been added to archive.
All files saved. Now backing up database
trans-unit.target: Все файлы сохранены. Идет резерное копирование базы данных

trans-unit.source: You need allow_url_fopen or cURL enabled for automatic download to work. You can also manually upload it in filepath %s.
trans-unit.target: Вы должны включить allow_url_fopen или cURL для работы автоматической загрузки. Также возможна ручная загрузка файлов в %s.

trans-unit.source: Download complete but MD5 sum does not match (%s).
trans-unit.target: Загрузка завершена, однако суммы MD5 не совпадают (%s).

trans-unit.source: Download complete but MD5 sum does not match (%s). Operation aborted.
trans-unit.target: Загрузка завершена, однако суммы MD5 не совпадают (%s). Действие отменено.

trans-unit.source: Error during download. The private key may be incorrect.
trans-unit.target: Ошибка при загрузке. Возможно, из-за некорректного закрытого ключа.

trans-unit.source: Unable to extract %filepath% file into %destination% folder...
No prestashop/ folder found in the ZIP file. Aborting.
trans-unit.target: В архиве отсутствует папка prestashop/. Отмена действия.

trans-unit.source: File extraction complete. Now backing up files...
trans-unit.target: File extraction complete. Now backing up files...

trans-unit.source: Upgrade process done, but some warnings have been found.
trans-unit.target: Обновление завершено, но при этом возникли предупреждения.

trans-unit.source: Upgrade process done. Congratulations! You can now reactivate your shop.
trans-unit.target: Процесс обновления завершен. Поздравляем! Теперь вы можете активировать ваш магазин.

trans-unit.source: Error during database upgrade. You may need to restore your database.
trans-unit.target: Ошибка в процессе обновления базы данных. Вашей базе данных может потребоваться восстановление.

trans-unit.source: Database upgraded. Now upgrading your Addons modules...
trans-unit.target: База данных обновлена. Начинается обновление модулей дополнений...

trans-unit.source: All files upgraded. Now upgrading database...
trans-unit.target: Все файлы обновлены. Начинается обновление базы данных...

trans-unit.source: Error when trying to upgrade file %s.
[TRANSLATION] The translation files have been merged into file %s.
[TRANSLATION] The translation files have not been merged into file %filename%. Switch to copy %filename%.
trans-unit.target: [TRANSLATION] Не удалось объединить файлы перевода в файл %filename%. Переключение на копию %filename%.

trans-unit.source: Could not assert the folder %s contains a valid PrestaShop release, exiting.
trans-unit.target: Завершение, так как не удаётся проверить, что папка %s содержит корректную версию PrestaShop.

trans-unit.source: A file may be missing, or the release is stored in a subfolder by mistake.
trans-unit.target: Возможно, отсутствует файл или релиз был по ошибке помещён в подпапку.

trans-unit.source: [ERROR] Unable to find files to upgrade.
[WARNING] Error when trying to retrieve module %s instance.
trans-unit.target: [WARNING] Error when trying to retrieve module %s instance.

trans-unit.source: Module %s does not need to be migrated. Module is up to date.
trans-unit.target: Module %s does not need to be migrated. Module is up to date.

trans-unit.source: Addons modules files have been upgraded.
Downloading and unzipping steps have been skipped, upgrade process will now remove sample data.
trans-unit.target: Этапы загрузки и распаковки пропущены, теперь обновление удалит демо-данные.

trans-unit.source: Shop deactivated. Now backing up files...
trans-unit.target: Shop deactivated. Now backing up files...

trans-unit.source: Downloading step has been skipped, upgrade process will now unzip the local archive.
trans-unit.target: Этап загрузки пропущен, начинается распаковка локального архива.

trans-unit.source: Shop deactivated. Now downloading... (this can take a while)
trans-unit.target: Магазин деактивирован. Идет загрузка... (это займет некоторое время)

trans-unit.source: MD5 hash will be checked against %s
Private release (require link and MD5 hash)
trans-unit.target: Частные релизы (требуется ссылка и хеш MD5)

trans-unit.source: Back up my files and database
trans-unit.target: Back up my files and database

trans-unit.source: Automatically back up your database and files in order to restore your shop if needed. This is experimental: you should still perform your own manual backup for safety.
trans-unit.target: Automatically back up your database and files in order to restore your shop if needed. This is experimental: you should still perform your own manual backup for safety.

trans-unit.source: To save time, you can decide not to back your images up. In any case, always make sure you did back them up manually.
trans-unit.target: To save time, you can decide not to back your images up. In any case, always make sure you did back them up manually.

trans-unit.source: Unless you are using a dedicated server, select "Low".
trans-unit.target: Unless you are using a dedicated server, select "Low".

trans-unit.source: A high value can cause the upgrade to fail if your server is not powerful enough to process the upgrade tasks in a short amount of time.
trans-unit.target: A high value can cause the upgrade to fail if your server is not powerful enough to process the upgrade tasks in a short amount of time.

trans-unit.source: As non-native modules can experience some compatibility issues, we recommend to disable them by default.
trans-unit.target: As non-native modules can experience some compatibility issues, we recommend to disable them by default.

trans-unit.source: Keeping them enabled might prevent you from loading the "Modules" page properly after the upgrade.
trans-unit.target: Keeping them enabled might prevent you from loading the "Modules" page properly after the upgrade.

trans-unit.source: Enable or disable all classes and controllers overrides.
trans-unit.target: Enable or disable all classes and controllers overrides.

trans-unit.source: If you customized the default PrestaShop theme in its folder (folder name "classic" in 1.7), enabling this option will lose your modifications.
trans-unit.target: If you customized the default PrestaShop theme in its folder (folder name "classic" in 1.7), enabling this option will lose your modifications.

trans-unit.source: If you are using your own theme, enabling this option will simply update the default theme files, and your own theme will be safe.
trans-unit.target: If you are using your own theme, enabling this option will simply update the default theme files, and your own theme will be safe.

trans-unit.source: If enabled, any RTL-specific files that you might have added to all your themes might be deleted by the created stylesheet.
trans-unit.target: If enabled, any RTL-specific files that you might have added to all your themes might be deleted by the created stylesheet.

trans-unit.source: This will change your theme: your shop will then use the default theme of the version of PrestaShop you are upgrading to.
trans-unit.target: This will change your theme: your shop will then use the default theme of the version of PrestaShop you are upgrading to.

trans-unit.source: This will not upgrade the default PrestaShop e-mails.
trans-unit.target: This will not upgrade the default PrestaShop e-mails.

trans-unit.source: If you customized the default PrestaShop e-mail templates, enabling this option will keep your modifications.
trans-unit.target: If you customized the default PrestaShop e-mail templates, enabling this option will keep your modifications.

trans-unit.source: [TECHNICAL ERROR] ajax-upgradetab.php is missing. Please reinstall or reset the module.
trans-unit.target: [TECHNICAL ERROR] Отсутствует ajax-upgradetab.php. Переустановите или сбросьте модуль в начальное состояние.

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want to delete this backup?
trans-unit.target: Вы точно хотите удалить эту резервную копию?

trans-unit.source: An update is currently in progress... Click "OK" to abort.
trans-unit.target: Идет процесс обновления... Нажмите "ОК" для отмены.

trans-unit.source: Upgrade complete, but warning notifications has been found.
Your server cannot download the file. Please upload it first by ftp in your admin/autoupgrade directory
trans-unit.target: Ваш сервер не может загрузить файл. Загрузите его по протоколу ftp в директорию admin/autoupgrade
Для данного действия обнаружена ошибка Javascript (parseJSON)

trans-unit.source: [TECHNICAL ERROR] ajax-upgradetab.php is missing. Please reinstall the module.
Click to refresh the page and use the new configuration
trans-unit.target: Нажмите, чтобы обновить страницу и использовать новую конфигурацию

trans-unit.source: The request exceeded the max_time_limit. Please change your server configuration.
trans-unit.target: Запрос превысил max_time_limit. Пожалуйста, измените конфигурацию вашего сервера.

trans-unit.source: Link and MD5 hash cannot be empty
trans-unit.target: Ссылка и хэш MD5 не могут быть пустыми

trans-unit.source: You need to enter the version number associated with the archive.
trans-unit.target: Вы должны указать номер версии, связанный с архивом.

trans-unit.target: Вы должны указать номер версии для этой директории.

trans-unit.source: Please confirm that you want to skip the backup.
Please confirm that you want to preserve file options.
trans-unit.target: Подтвердите, что хотите сохранить параметры файлов.

trans-unit.target: No XML file has been selected.

trans-unit.target: No archive and no XML file have been selected.

[ERROR] Version to install is too old.

trans-unit.target: [ERROR] %dir% does not exist or is not a directory.

trans-unit.target: [ERROR] %s does not exist or is not a directory.

trans-unit.target: Could not close the Zip file: %toFile% properly. Check you are allowed to write on the disk and there is available space on it.

trans-unit.target: Could not extract %file% from backup, the destination might not be writable.

Unable to write in the directory "%s"
trans-unit.target: Unable to write in the directory "%s"

trans-unit.source: Error when trying to delete backups %s
The module %s requires PHP %s to work properly. Please upgrade your server configuration.
trans-unit.target: The module %s requires PHP %s to work properly. Please upgrade your server configuration.

trans-unit.source: Give us details about the error
trans-unit.target: Give us details about the error
Контрольный список проверок, необходимых до начала обновления

trans-unit.source: Your current version of the module is out of date. Update now
trans-unit.target: Your current version of the module is out of date. Update now

trans-unit.source: The checklist is not OK. You can only upgrade your shop once all indicators are green.
trans-unit.target: Проверьте контрольный список! Обновление можно начинать только в том случае, когда все индикаторы зелёного цвета.

trans-unit.source: Before starting the upgrade process, please make sure this checklist is all green.
trans-unit.target: Перед началом обновления убедитесь, что все пункты контрольного списка выделены зеленым цветом.

trans-unit.source: Your current PHP version isn't compatible with your PrestaShop version. (Expected: %s - %s | Current: %s)
trans-unit.target: Your current PHP version isn't compatible with your PrestaShop version. (Expected: %s - %s | Current: %s)

trans-unit.source: We were unable to check your PHP compatibility with the destination PrestaShop version.
trans-unit.target: We were unable to check your PHP compatibility with the destination PrestaShop version.

trans-unit.source: Your store's root directory (%s) is writable (with appropriate CHMOD permissions).
trans-unit.target: Your store's root directory (%s) is writable (with appropriate CHMOD permissions).

trans-unit.source: The "/admin/autoupgrade" directory is writable (appropriate CHMOD permissions)
trans-unit.target: В каталог "/admin/autoupgrade" разрешена запись (с соответствующими разрешениями CHMOD)

trans-unit.source: PHP's "Safe mode" option is turned off
PHP's "allow_url_fopen" option is turned on, or cURL is installed
trans-unit.target: Параметр РНР "allow_url_fopen" включен или установлен cURL

trans-unit.source: Your store is in maintenance mode
trans-unit.target: Магазин находится в режиме технического обслуживания

trans-unit.source: Enable maintenance mode and add your maintenance IP in [1]Shop parameters > General > Maintenance[/1]
trans-unit.target: Enable maintenance mode and add your maintenance IP in [1]Shop parameters > General > Maintenance[/1]

trans-unit.source: PHP's max_execution_time setting has a high value or is disabled entirely (current value: unlimited)
trans-unit.target: Параметр РНР max_execution_time или слишком большой, или отключен (текущее значение: бесконечно)

trans-unit.source: PHP's max_execution_time setting has a high value or is disabled entirely (current value: %s seconds)
trans-unit.target: Параметр РНР max_execution_time или слишком большой, или отключен (текущее значение: %s сек.)

trans-unit.source: The following PHP extensions are not installed: %s.
trans-unit.target: The following PHP extensions are not installed: %s.

trans-unit.source: The following PHP extension is not installed: %s.
trans-unit.target: The following PHP extension is not installed: %s.

trans-unit.source: PHP memory_limit is inferior to 256 MB.
trans-unit.target: PHP memory_limit is inferior to 256 MB.

trans-unit.source: The following PHP functions are not installed: %s.
trans-unit.target: The following PHP functions are not installed: %s.

trans-unit.source: The following PHP function is not installed: %s.
trans-unit.target: The following PHP function is not installed: %s.

trans-unit.source: It's not possible to create a PHP session.
trans-unit.target: It's not possible to create a PHP session.

trans-unit.target: Unable to generate private keys using openssl_pkey_new. Check your OpenSSL configuration, especially the path to openssl.cafile.

trans-unit.source: It's not possible to write in the following folders:
trans-unit.target: It's not possible to write in the following folders:

trans-unit.source: The version of PrestaShop does not match the one stored in database. Your database structure may not be up-to-date and/or the value of PS_VERSION_DB needs to be updated in the configuration table. [1]Learn more[/1].
trans-unit.target: The version of PrestaShop does not match the one stored in database. Your database structure may not be up-to-date and/or the value of PS_VERSION_DB needs to be updated in the configuration table. [1]Learn more[/1].

trans-unit.source: Please also make sure you make a full manual backup of your files and database.
trans-unit.target: Также имеет смысл сделать полную резервную копию файлов и базы данных вручную.

trans-unit.source: Before continuing with your tasks, please review the following checklist to ensure smooth operation after recent recovery.
trans-unit.target: Before continuing with your tasks, please review the following checklist to ensure smooth operation after recent recovery.

trans-unit.source: If you can't access your back office, try emptying the cache.
trans-unit.target: If you can't access your back office, try emptying the cache.

trans-unit.source: Disable the maintenance mode in General settings > Maintenance.
trans-unit.target: Disable the maintenance mode in General settings > Maintenance.

trans-unit.source: Your store is up to date
trans-unit.target: Your store is up to date

trans-unit.source: Before continuing with your tasks, please review the following checklist to ensure smooth operation after recent updates
trans-unit.target: Before continuing with your tasks, please review the following checklist to ensure smooth operation after recent updates

trans-unit.source: Re-enable and check your modules one by one.
trans-unit.target: Re-enable and check your modules one by one.

trans-unit.source: Make sure your store's front office is working properly: try to create an account, place an order, add a product, etc.
trans-unit.target: Make sure your store's front office is working properly: try to create an account, place an order, add a product, etc.

trans-unit.source: If some images don't appear in the front office, try regenerating thumbnails in Preferences > Images.
trans-unit.target: If some images don't appear in the front office, try regenerating thumbnails in Preferences > Images.

trans-unit.source: If something's wrong, you can restore a backup with this module. Your backup is available at {admin}/autoupgrade/backup.
trans-unit.target: If something's wrong, you can restore a backup with this module. Your backup is available at {admin}/autoupgrade/backup.

trans-unit.source: If you can't access your back office, try enabling the debug mode manually in config/defines.inc.php by setting _PS_MODE_DEV_ to true.
trans-unit.target: If you can't access your back office, try enabling the debug mode manually in config/defines.inc.php by setting _PS_MODE_DEV_ to true.

trans-unit.source: After upgrading your shop, you can rollback to the previous database and files. Use this function if your theme or an essential module is not working correctly.
trans-unit.target: После обновления магазина есть возможность откатиться к предыдущей версии базы данных и файлов. Используйте эту функцию если ваш шаблон или нужный модуль работает некорректно.

trans-unit.source: You come from the future! You are using a more recent version than the latest available!
trans-unit.target: Вы явились из будущего! Вы используете более свежую версию, чем последняя версия от разработчика!

trans-unit.source: Congratulations, you are already using the latest version available!
trans-unit.target: Поздравляем, вы используете последнюю доступную версию!

trans-unit.source: Open changelog in a new window
trans-unit.target: Открыть список изменений в новом окне

trans-unit.source: No file will be downloaded (channel %s is used)
trans-unit.target: Ни один файл не будет загржен (используется канал %s)

trans-unit.source: The following action are automatically replaced
To change this behavior, you need to manually edit your php files
trans-unit.target: Для изменения такого поведения, вам необходимо вручную изменить ваши файлы php

trans-unit.source: Check if a new version is available
Channels are offering you different ways to perform an upgrade. You can either upload the new version manually or let the 1-Click Upgrade module download it for you.
trans-unit.target: Каналы позволяют вам выбирать способ обновления. Вы можете загрузить новую версию вручную или разрешить модулю 1-click upgrade самому осуществить загрузку обновления.

trans-unit.source: The Alpha, Beta and Private channels give you the ability to upgrade to a non-official or unstable release (for testing purposes only).
trans-unit.target: Каналы альфа, бета и частные каналы дают вам возможность обновляться до неофициальных или нестабильных релизов (только для целей тестирования).

trans-unit.source: By default, you should use the "Minor release" channel which is offering the latest stable version available.
trans-unit.target: Рекомендуется использовать канал "минорные выпуски", предлагающий последнюю доступную стабильную версию.

trans-unit.source: No archive found in your admin/autoupgrade/download directory
trans-unit.target: Не найден архив в директории admin/autoupgrade/download

trans-unit.source: Save in the following directory the archive file and XML file of the version you want to upgrade to: %s
trans-unit.target: Save in the following directory the archive file and XML file of the version you want to upgrade to: %s

trans-unit.source: Click to save once the archive is there.
trans-unit.target: Click to save once the archive is there.

trans-unit.source: This option will skip the download step.
trans-unit.target: При включении этой опции будет пропущен этап загрузки.

trans-unit.source: Save in the following directory the uncompressed PrestaShop files of the version you want to upgrade to: %s
trans-unit.target: Сохраните распакованные файлы обновления в эту директорию: %s

trans-unit.source: Please tell us which version you are upgrading to [1](1.7.0.1 for instance)[/1]
trans-unit.target: Пожалуйста, сообщите нам, какую версию вы обновляете до [1](например, 1.7.0.1)[/1]

trans-unit.source: This option will skip both download and unzip steps and will use %1$s as the source directory
trans-unit.target: Эта опция пропускает шаги загрузки и распаковки. В качестве источника обновления будет использована директория %1$s

trans-unit.source: Upgrade your store to benefit from the latest improvements, bug fixes and security patches.
trans-unit.target: Upgrade your store to benefit from the latest improvements, bug fixes and security patches.

trans-unit.source: Upgrading your store on your own can be risky. If you don't feel comfortable doing the upgrade yourself, many agencies and developers in your area may also provide this kind of service.
trans-unit.target: Upgrading your store on your own can be risky. If you don't feel comfortable doing the upgrade yourself, many agencies and developers in your area may also provide this kind of service.
